titleStmt.title: SII 12.151: original edition by V. Venkatasubba Ayyar
No. 151. (A.R. No. 304 of 1913). CHIDAMBARAM, CHIDAMBARAM TALUK, SOUTH ARCOT DISTRICT. ON THE NORTH WALL OF THE THIRD PRĀKĀRA IN THE NAṬARĀJA TEMPLE.

summary.p: This inscription, dated in the 7th year, contains an order of the officer Śōḻakōṉ issued to the authorities of the temple at Chidambaram, to engrave on their temple walls, the gift of a flower garden made after purchase by a dēvaraḍiyār named Piḷḷaiyār Śiṟṟiḍai Arivai and one Iṟaṅgalmīṭṭa-piḷḷaiyār, for providing flowers for the goddess Tirukkāmakkōṭṭamuḍaiya-Periyanāchchiyār and for the maintenance of two servants looking after the garden.

It may be mentioned that the officers Jayatuṅga-Pallavaraiyar, Tillaiämbala-Pallavaraiyar and Teṉṉavaṉ-BrahmamārāyanThey also figure in the reign of Jaṭāvarman Sundara-Pāṇḍya (A.R. Nos. 293 and 297 of 1913). It may be mentioned here that ‘Teṉṉavaṉ-Brahmārājaṉ’ was a title conferred on Māṇikkavāchakar by the Pāṇḍya king. It is also possible that the other two names are titles. mentioned here also figure in No. 124 of 1888, a record of the 28th year of Māṟavarman Kulaśēkharadēva (A.D. 1296) from the same temple.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī ḷa sakalapuvaṉaccakkaravattikaḷ śrī Avaṉiyāḷappiṟantārāṉa kopperuñciṅkatevaṟku yāṇṭu 7vatu coḻakoṉ Olai . teṉṉavaṉbrahmamārāyarum
jayatuṅkapallavaraiyarum tillaiAmpalapallavaraiyarum Uṭaiyār tirucciṟṟampalamuṭaiyār koyil śrī māheśvara kaṇkāṇi ceyvārkaḷum śrīkāriyañ ceyvārkaḷum
sāmutāyañ ceyvārkaḷum koyilnāyakañ ceyvārkaḷum tirumāḷikaikkūṟu ceyvārkaḷum kaṇakkarum kaṇṭu viṭu tantatāvatu . koyilukku ciṟappākac cāttiAruḷa tevara
ṭiyāril piḷḷaiyār ciṟṟiṭaiArivai ceyvikkiṟa tirunantavaṉattukku tirunantavaṉattaṟai yāka perumpaṟṟappuliyūr piṭākai kaṭavācceriyil Uḻaiccāṇaṉ tirunaṭṭapperumāḷ civaṉ
pakkal kavuṇiyaṉ tirucciṟṟampalamuṭaiyāṉ viṉāyakan peril vilaikoṇṭa Ūrppaṭi nilam Orumāvum tirunantavaṉañ ceyyavum tirunantavaṉam ceyyum Āḷ Oṉṟukku tirunanta vaṉappuṟamāka Ivūr piṭākai caṇṭe
śuranallūril kulottuṅkacoḻapiramārāyaṉ brāhmaṇi pakkal koṇṭa civakāmacuntari viḷākam Eṉṟu peruṭaiya Ūrpaṭi nilam nālumāvum Ivūr piṭākai Iḷanāṅkūril teṉṉavaṉ brahmamārāyar pakkal vilaikoṇṭa
cirāviḷākam Eṉṟu peruṭaiya nilattu Ūrppaṭi nilam Oru māvum koṟṟukku Uṭalākavum tirukkāmakkoṭṭamuṭaiya periyaṉācciyārkkuc cāttiaruḷa Iṟaṅkalmiṭṭapiḷḷaiyār ceyvikkiṟa tirunantavaṉattukku Ivūr piṭākai naṭuvilkaraiyil
tirukkaḷiṟṟupaṭit toṇṭaṉ pakkal vilaikoṇṭa kuḻi nūṟum tirunantavaṉañceyavum tirunantavaṉañceyum Āḷ Oṉṟukku tirunantavaṉappuṟamāka Ivūr piṭākai Iḷanāṅkūril teṉṉavaṉ brahmamārāyar pakkal vilaikoṇṭa cirāviḷākam Eṉṟu peruṭaiya nilattu
Ūrpaṭi nilam Eḻumāvum koṟṟukku Uṭalākavum Āka Āḷ Iraṇṭu Āḷ Oṉṟukku nāḷ Oṉṟukku kuṟuṇi nānāḻiyāka vanta tiruppaḷḷittāmam tiruppūmaṇṭapattu mutalāka Aḷak kavum tirunantavaṉattukkum tirunantavaṉappuṟamāka koṟṟukkum vilaikoṇṭa nilattukku
vilaikoṇṭa cātaṉaṅkaḷum nilaṅkaḷilum paṅku vari kaḻiya perumpaṟṟappuliyūr mulaparuṣaiyār Eḻutiṉa niyokamum tirukkaiOṭṭi paṇṭārattu Oṭukkavum . Ippaṭikku tirumāḷikaiyil kalveṭṭakkaṭavatāka paṇṇuvate . Ivai coḻakoṉ Eḻutteṉṟu pukunta Evaṟ tiṭṭuppaṭi kal
veṭṭiyatu ḷa
Digital edition of SII 12.151 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
